title: Lead User Researcher
description:
Join us as a Lead User Researcher and you’ll contribute to projects that will affect every person in the UK at some point in their life. Leading a team of six, you’ll drive research projects across multiple departments, focusing on the digital transformation of DWP services.

You will lead your researchers to work in a collaborative way, alongside designers, developers and numerous stakeholders. That means you must be an influential team leader, who can coach individuals and build strong working relationships.

With a proven record in Digital Research, you’ll be used to working on large-scale digital projects. You might have worked in-house or for a specialist agency – either way, you’ll be analytical, motivated and a critical thinker. You combine these talents with a flexible approach, perhaps with a degree in Psychology or another relevant subject.

If you’re ambitious, experienced and good with people, you could be joining us in our Newcastle or London digital hub. Here, you’ll work as a Lead User Researcher to transform public services, putting user needs at the heart of your work. With a Department as large and complex as ours, the projects will be interesting, numerous and incredibly varied.
